dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Ezine Articles
dmca.body:
Feb. 9, 2006 

Kevin Lee 
212 - 925 Chancellor Drive 
Winnipeg, MB 
R3T 2J9 
CANADA 
Email: vekkish@gmail.com 

Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
 
Re: Use of article on website without reference to author or link to site. 

The copyrighted work at issue is found at: 

http://ezinearticles.com/?10-Uses-Of-Emu-Oil-For-Softer-Healthier-Looking-Skin
&id=370664 

The copyright material was found on: 

Search engine: Google Blog Search 
Infringing web page: http://beautytipsfree.blogspot.com/2007/01/10-uses-of-emu-oil-for-softer-healthier.html
 
Use of reprint material from ezinearticles.com states: 

1. If you wish to publish/reprint any article from our site in your ezine, website, blog, forum, RSS feed or print publication, you must: 
a. Respect the copyrights of the authors by publishing the entire article as it is with no change. 
b. Agree to include the FULL Resource box or SIG line at the end of the article. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Regards,

Kevin Lee
